name: theARTboy
body:
#theARTboy
This site is a collection of some of my code based projects. Enjoy.

##Projects

###Processing Trig Demo
Demonstration of SOHCAHTOA written in Processing: [Trigonometry](trigDemo/index.html)

###Processing Platform Game
Simple platform game with animated sprites [platformer](https://github.com/theartboy/processingPlatformGame)

###P5js Circle Collision Demo
Demonstration of circle based collision detection [circle collisions](circleCollisionDetection/index.html)

###MADlibs
This is a madlibs style activity using javascript to refresh the user page in the browser [MADlibs](MADlibs/start.html)

Copyright 2016 John McCaffrey (@theartboy)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
